sentence.Network_en: Her new glasses make her look rather owlish.
sentence.Network_cn: 她戴着新眼镜看上去很文气.

sentence.Network_en: With his owlish face, it is easy to understand why he was called "The Professor".
sentence.Network_cn: 看看那张严肃而又睿智的猫头鹰脸，就不难理解他为什么被称为“教授”了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译... ... owlet 小猫头鹰 owlish 猫头鹰般的 owllight 微明.
英语词典查询：owl ... owl-eyed 夜间看得最清楚的详细 owlish 像猫头鹰的详细 owlishly 严肃地详细.

entry.tran: （尤指戴眼镜的人）猫头鹰似的，看似严肃而又聪慧的
entry.def: An owlish person looks rather like an owl, especially because they wear glasses, and seems to be very serious and clever.

example.ex: With his owlish face, it is easy to understand why he was called 'The Professor'.
example.tran: 看看那张严肃而又睿智的猫头鹰脸，就不难理解他为什么被称为“教授”了。

means.word_mean: 1. resembling an owl; solemn and wise in appearance
